bills.title: Align home value amounts for school district property tax impact statements
Move spring enrollment count date one week earlier
Request interim study on special education
Revise laws regarding targeted early numeracy intervention
Fund 6th graders in middle school at high school ANB rates along with 7th and 8th graders
Establish Montana's BEST program to bolster educator support and training
Establish the child care workforce recruitment and retention support payment program
Establishing the school mental health promotion pilot program
Eliminate reduced-price copayments for school lunch and breakfast
Allow the term "emotional disability" to be used instead of "emotional disturbance" as it relates to special education
Provide for the sudden cardiac arrest prevention in youth sports
